title: About Me

aboutMeEsp: Mi nombre es Gast칩n, tengo 29 a침os y actualmente me encuentro trabajando y estudiando en Puerto Madryn - Chubut. aboutMeIng: Hello stranger!, my name is Gast칩n, i'm 29 yo and i'm actually living in Puerto Madryn - Chubut. My main interests are new technologies, photography, music, and traveling. If you want to have a chat, i invited you to leave me a message on my social media.
